title: CRs Actions Config
description: Configuration file for CRs Actions in GitHub workflows

$schema.description: The JSON schema for this configuration file

default_repo_owner.description: When not in a pull request context, this username may be used to assign certain kinds of CRs that are otherwise not easy to assign to a particular user. For example, invalid CRs when creating CR annotations for a particular commit outside of a pull request.

user_mentions_allowlist.description: List of users who can be mentioned in CR annotations using @ mentions. Only users in this list can be notified. Defaults to an empty list (no mentions allowed) if not provided. This is a protection measure to avoid spamming users.

invalid_crs_annotation_severity.description: Controls the GitHub annotation severity level for invalid CR syntax. This determines how prominently invalid CRs are displayed in GitHub's UI.

crs_due_now_annotation_severity.description: Controls the GitHub annotation severity level for CRs that are due now (such as in the PR where they were found).
